Mei.name: Snow Blind
Mei.description: Throw a snowball that hits all enemies in an area. Enemies hit take 70 (+4% per level) damage, are Slowed by 35%, and are Blinded for 1.75 seconds.

Mei.name: Blizzard
Mei.description: Command Snowball to create a Blizzard at the target location for 2 seconds. Enemies within the blizzard take 13 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds and are Slowed by 7%, stacking up to 35%. When the Blizzard ends, enemies within its area take an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 1.25 seconds.

Mei.name: Icing
Mei.description: Slide quickly in the targeted direction. When this effect ends, enemies near Mei are knocked back, take 52 (+4% per level) damage, and are Slowed by 80%, rapidly decaying over 1.5 seconds.  Can be canceled during sliding.

Mei.name: Avalanche
Mei.description: After 0.5 seconds, roll a massive snowball that consumes enemy Heroes in its path. At the end of its path, the snowball crumbles, releasing the consumed Heroes, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds per Hero consumed.

Mei.name: Ice Wall
Mei.description: Vector Targeting After a 0.75 second delay, create an impassable wall that traps enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. When the wall expires, trapped Heroes are Slowed by 75%, decaying over 3 seconds.

Mei.name: Cryo-Freeze
Mei.description: Become encased in ice for 3 seconds, gaining a rapidly decaying Shield that absorbs up to 1104 (+4% per level) damage. While active, this Shield grants Unstoppable and restores up to 35% of Mei's maximum Health.

1.name: Heavy Pack
1.description: Increases the duration of Snow Blind's Slow by 1.5 seconds. Each time Blizzard damages an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Snow Blind by 0.5 seconds and gain 3 Mana.

1.name: Ice Storm
1.description: Every 3rd hit of Blizzard against enemy Heroes deals an additional 42 (+4% per level) damage. Blizzard's final Stun damage is increased by 150% against all enemies.

1.name: Heat Transfer
1.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed Heroes deal 33% more damage. Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero she heals for 16 (+4% per level) Health.

4.name: Slushball
4.description: Snow Blind deals 75% increased damage and Structures hit are disabled for 3 seconds.

4.name: Cold Front
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Icing by 3 seconds.  If Mei enters her own Blizzard while Icing is active, the cooldown of Icing is reduced by 5 seconds and she gains 80 Mana.

4.name: Crystallize
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Cryo-Freeze by 10 seconds. Mei gains 40 Spell Armor while Cryo-Freeze is active and for 1 second after.

7.name: Induce Hibernation
7.description: Blizzard reduces the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside of its area by 40%.  When Blizzard ends, enemy Heroes still within its area gain this effect for an additional 4 seconds.

7.name: Skating Away
7.description: When Icing ends, Mei and all nearby allied Heroes gain 20% Movement Speed and 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds.

7.name: Backup Battery
7.description: Activate to remove all Roots and Slows and regenerate 20% of maximum Health over 2 seconds. The cooldown of this ability is reduced by 10 seconds each time Mei picks up a Regeneration Globe.

10.name: Avalanche
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, roll a massive snowball that consumes enemy Heroes in its path. At the end of its path, the snowball crumbles, releasing the consumed Heroes, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds per Hero consumed.

10.name: Ice Wall
10.description: Vector Targeting After a 0.75 second delay, create an impassable wall that traps enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. When the wall expires, trapped Heroes are Slowed by 75%, decaying over 3 seconds.

13.name: Flurry
13.description: While in her own Blizzard, Mei gains 50% increased Attack Speed and Blizzard's cooldown refreshes 125% faster. If Mei is in her own Blizzard when it ends, gain these bonuses for 3 additional seconds.

13.name: Cooling Servos
13.description: While Cryo-Freeze is active, Mei's Basic Ability cooldowns recover 200% faster.  Passive: Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Polar Vortex
13.description: Using an ability causes Mei to deal 24 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes damaged by this effect also have their Movement Speed and Attack Speed Slowed by 20%.

16.name: Fresh Powder
16.description: Snow Blind gains an additional charge and its range is increased by 33%.

16.name: Black Ice
16.description: Icing's Slow effect no longer decays over its duration. Icing deals 300% more damage to enemies very close to Mei.

16.name: Acclimation
16.description: Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero, the damage she deals and healing she receives is increased by 1%, stacking up to 20 times. While at maximum stacks, Mei also gains 10 Armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

20.name: Cascade
20.description: While traveling, Avalanche constantly launches a volley of untalented Snow Blind snowballs ahead of itself.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Avalanche by 30 seconds.

20.name: Shatter
20.description: When Ice Wall expires, trapped enemy Heroes hit take 210 (+4% per level) damage and have their Armor reduced by 25 for 5 seconds.

20.name: The Big One
20.description: Every 15 seconds, the next Snow Blind you cast has 67% increased area and 200% increased damage.

20.name: Flash Freeze
20.description: When Mei takes fatal damage she instantly gains Cryo-Freeze. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.
